title: Joshua Tree National Park: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps          Park Maps  Park map with shaded relief (636k PDF) Southern California regional map (103 kB PDF)        Campground Maps   Map of Black Rock Campground (110 kB PDF) Map of Indian Cove Campground (134 kB PDF) Map of Jumbo Rocks Campground (135 kB PDF) Map of Cottonwood Campground (120 kB PDF) Map of Hidden Valley Campground (123 kB PDF) Map of Ryan Campground (123 kB) Map of Belle Campground (94 kB PDF) Map of White Tank Campground (110 kB PDF) Map of Sheep Pass Group Campground (99 kB PDF) Overflow Camping Map (484 kB PDF) - ideas about where to camp outside the park        Backcountry Road Maps These roads vary greatly in condition and level of technical driving skill required. See the backcountry roads page for more information. Always ask a ranger for current information about road conditions before venturing out.  Berdoo Canyon Road (56 kB pdf) Geology Tour Road (58 kB pdf) Old Dale/Black Eagle Mine Roads (87k pdf) Pinkam Canyon Road (73k pdf)       Simplified Trail Maps These maps have no topographic detail and should not be relied upon for navigation.  Barker Dam & Wall Street Mill (169 kB PDF) Black Rock Canyon Hiking Trails (186 kB PDF) 49 Palms Oasis (116 kB PDF) Hidden Valley (163 kB PDF) Lost Horse Mine & Mountain (143 kB PDF) Lost Palms Oasis & Mastodon Peak (171 kB PDF) Pine City (148 kB PDF) Ryan Mountain (143 kB PDF) Willow Hole (643 kB PDF)       Backcountry Registration Boards & Associated Trails These maps show areas suitable for overnight backpacking trips. Get more information on backcountry camping in Joshua Tree.  Black Rock Canyon (640 kB PDF) Cottonwood Spring (381 kB PDF) Covington (433 kB PDF) Geology Tour (711 kB PDF) Indian Cove (409 kB PDF) Juniper Flats (693 kB PDF) Keys West (456 kB PDF) North Entrance (580 kB PDF) Pine City (700 kB PDF) Pleasant Valley (782 kB PDF) Porcupine Wash (325 kB PDF) Turkey Flats (409 kB PDF) Twin Tanks (379 k PDF)        Rock Climbing Maps These maps show some of the major named climbing areas in Joshua Tree National Park. See the climbing pages for more information about the park's legendary rock climbing and bouldering opportunities.  Indian Cove (326 kB PDF) Hidden Valley (1.12 MB PDF) Sheep Pass (211 kB PDF) Queen Valley (307 kB PDF) Geology Tour (301 kB PDF) Split Rock (503 kB PDF) Belle & White Tank (78 kB PDF)       Equestrian Maps These maps show the trails open to horse use in the two most popular areas of the park for horseback riders. These maps have no topographic detail and should not be relied upon for navigation. Learn more about horseback riding in Joshua Tree.   Black Rock Canyon Horse Trails (5.8 MB PDF) West Entrance Horse Trails (1.1 MB PDF)      Topographic Maps of the ParkEach of these maps is built on the corresponding USGS 7.5 minute topographic quad.Refer to the index map below to help you find the map you would like.            Rimrock (19 MB PDF) Yucca Valley North (8.3 MB PDF) Joshua Tree North (5.6 MB PDF) Sunfair (5.4 MB PDF) Twentynine Palms (5.5 MB PDF) Valley Mountain (4.1 MB PDF) Morongo Valley (52 MB PDF) Yucca Valley South (53 MB PDF) Joshua Tree South (12 MB PDF) Indian Cove (11 MB PDF) Queen Mountain (10 MB PDF) Twentynine Palms Mountain (10 MB PDF) Humbug Mountain (7.4 MB PDF) New Dale (11 MB PDF) Clarks Pass (9.6 MB PDF) Cadiz Valley SW (10 MB PDF) Cadiz Valley SE (6.9 MB PDF) Seven Palms Valley (33 MB PDF) East Deception Canyon (81 MB PDF) Keys View (19 MB PDF) Malapai Hill (8.7 MB PDF) Fried Liver Wash (12 MB PDF) Pinto Mountain (8.6 MB PDF) San Bernardino Wash (5.0 MB PDF) Placer Canyon (14 MB PDF) Pinto Wells (7.2 MB PDF) Coxcomb Mountains (11 MB PDF) West Berdoo Canyon (24 MB PDF) Rockhouse Canyon (41 MB PDF) Washington Wash (14 MB PDF) Porcupine Wash (8.7 MB PDF) Conejo Well (7.9 MB PDF) Buzzard Spring (15 MB PDF) Victory Pass (6.3 MB PDF) East of Victory Pass (7.1 MB PDF) Thermal Canyon (11 MB PDF) Cottonwood Basin (20 MB PDF) Cottonwood Spring (24 MB PDF) Hayfield (35 MB PDF) Hayfield Spring (21 MB PDF) Desert Center (8.1 MB PDF)
